# latextags

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/fikovnik/latextags/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/fikovnik/latextags?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

Output values from R into LaTeX files that can be included in LaTeX documents.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fikovnik/latextags")
```
